spec.name: Trade Square
spec.description: Trade Square (Place du Commerce) is a historical public space located near the border of the Old Medina and the new town. Throughout the **19th and early 20th centuries**, it was a very important gathering point where **local and international traders** met to discuss business and finalize deals, particularly in real estate and port-related commerce. It represents the crucial mercantile spirit that fueled Casablanca's early transformation into an economic powerhouse.

timeline.title: Peak Period of Commercial Activity
timeline.description: The square served as a critical hub for international trade and real estate deals (Approximate period).
